channel.title: 317 need help with item glitch!
channel.description: So some items as in clothes and hats etc, glitch when i equip them, How would you be able to fix them? Most items work, just a select few. Does anyone know how to fix this problem, to where all items work naturally and correctly? To give an example of whats happening, i equip a beret and the helmet/hat im currently wearing stays equipped and my shield or something else will be unequipped. Is this a fixable problem that anyone knows how to take care of? :confused: If anyone can help, id be really happy

item.title: 317 need help with item glitch!
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

Please learn to post your base along with the revision so you don’t have things like this happening…

For delta;

jummppy:

umm i thinks its in item.java put it says helms body and there a lot of ids just add the id to where it goes and bam i think that works

For PI;

[quote="`SJ_, post:4, topic:447513"]Item.class has nothing to do with it, nor does the body[] array in item.class, it’s actually in ItemAssistant.class under the wearItem() { boolean. A fix is something like this;

if(wearID == ####);//The item id targetSlot = #;//the hat slot }[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: 317 need help with item glitch!
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Item.class has nothing to do with it, nor does the body[] array in item.class, it’s actually in ItemAssistant.class under the wearItem() { boolean. A fix is something like this;

if(wearID == ####);//The item id targetSlot = #;//the hat slot }

Read full topic

item.title: 317 need help with item glitch!
item.dc:creator: @lilmike012 lilmike012
item.description:
@lilmike012 wrote:

okay ill try that out and let you all know how it goes. Its really annoying when you have two hats on and no weapon :eek:
